name: Primerica
overview:
Primerica, the largest financial marketing organization in North America, offers comprehensive financial solutions to help clients achieve financial freedom and security.

Based in Duluth, GA, Primerica has over 100,000 licensed representatives, including 22,000 FINRA Series 6 licensed through Primerica’s securities broker-dealer affiliate PFS Investments, Inc. in the United States, and through PFSL Investments Canada Ltd. in Canada.

Primerica is focused on helping the middle-market sector in achieving financial stability often only offered to affluent society by traditional financial services firms.

With roots dating back to 1977, Primerica began a revolutionary crusade to transform the life insurance industry originating the “Buy Term and Invest the Difference” philosophy.

Since its inception, the company has grown to become one of the largest firms in the industry with 4.3 million lives insured through it.

A detailed overview of the company and its services is available at www.primerica.com.
